releaseNotes: - Sound: Boeffla & Flar Headphone: Properly re-implement per-channel gain.
- Sound: Flar Sound: add earpiece gain.
- SmartPack: move all the log (logcat, dmesg, last_kmsg etc.) related features into Advanced Options.
- SmartPack: added options to get dmesg-ramoops, console-ramoops (if available) etc.
- Misc changes, mainly in Sound page.
